definition: A term referring to the monetary compensation received by an individual in exchange for their work or services. It commonly denotes the salary or wages earned by an employee, typically on a regular basis, for their employment in a particular occupation or profession.

examples.german: Der Gehalt dieser Suppe ist zu hoch.
examples.english: The salt content of this soup is too high.

examples.german: Der Gehalt der Flüssigkeit muss gemessen werden.
examples.english: The concentration of the liquid needs to be measured.

examples.german: Das Gehalt an Vitamin C ist in Orangen hoch.
examples.english: The vitamin C content is high in oranges.
